bookSourceComment:
/*1.21 修复换源出错
	legado&&coolapk by:
youke2580||游客2580
登录设置繁简转换，默认关闭*/
bookSourceGroup: 源仓库,优质,整理校验,自制,网页源,69sx

ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>z=eval(String(source.loginUrl));
java.setContent(z)</js>
@put:{n:"[property$=book_name]@content",
a:"[property$=author]@content",
k:"[property~=category|status|update_time]@content",
w:"ul.infolist > li.0@textNodes",
l:"[property$=latest_chapter_name]@content",
i:".navtxt > p.0@text",
c:"[property$=image]@content",
u:"a.btn.more-btn@href"}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

ruleSearch.author: label.0@text||h4@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
so=/search.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(!so){
	result=java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
}
result
</js>
.newbox li||.mybox li||li
ruleSearch.name: h3@text||a.0@text

variableComment:
0：关闭繁简转换
1：开启繁简转换
